channel.title: Comments on: From Lefties to Punks

item.title: By: Keir
item.dc:creator: Keir
item.description: For the uninitiated this game is called six degrees of Johnny Rotten. We go from any subject to punk in as few moves as possible. No matter how tenuous the connection.
item.content:encoded: For the uninitiated this game is called six degrees of Johnny Rotten. We go from any subject to punk in as few moves as possible. No matter how tenuous the connection.
